title: No Freljord Update??
body:
With Nunu's update I assume that we would get the relaunched of Freljord's Lore and an update to the bios of some freljord champs. But it seems that only Liss, Velkoz and Gnar lores were updated. Unless, its still to early to assume there is none. I hope some rioter can clarify this.


Wanna see aniv, ash and sej's new lore so badly.

replies.body:
Glad you guys are all paying attention! I'd hate for us to update something and for it not to be noticed... ;-)

We are not automatically updating ALL the lore around a region with each new champion. Where something NEEDS updating in order to understand a new piece of lore, or where clarity is required, we prioritise that. The total average we can manage per month is about 10,000 words, give or take.

Ashe and Sejuani do not give much insight into Nunu & Willump, so we did not update them yet. Anivia could have been updated to tie in with Nunu and the Notai, but we decided to wait for a better opportunity.

A final note - we're not updating lore in places other than Universe or the Runeterra map. Old stuff, while it may still be viewable online, is not necessarily still canon, if it's not on one of the newer site locations.

waitin on volibear ehhhh?

personally, and I know this isn't exactly your department, but it would be cool if anivia got a VO update at the same time as volibear gets a vgu, whenever that happens, just  so that all those champions have cool interactions with each other (including ornn too), and are all holistically up to date with each other
I agree completely, it would be awesome if we could update champion VO and interactions more often.

Do you think if we (The community) ask enough you guys will start doing them. I know you guys have said you haven't got time or space to do it but a good amount of lore junkies and champ fans really do want these VO updates.
Will you be fixing Lissandra's new bio? It's a confusing mess that doesn't deliver the Lissandra we know and completely seems to 180 her motives and personality in some places. It's a hot mess.
Riot said they are gonna release more into the near future in other forms of media outside stories  (ex: comics,  cinematics etc.)

Yup but seems out of place to me considering the other factions pages were updated and some of freljords lore now seems outdated considering the retcon specially with liss' new lore. I think freljord champs like voli, aniv or gragas can wait/came from other forms of media but freljords retcon isn't freljord if they didn't retcon at least all the 3 sisters/its descendants(ash and sej).

EDIT: Plus, who wouldn't want to see the vision of freljord pictures have descriptions or even the animals/culture of it(specially all diff tribes).

Lissandra was the Lore leader in the freljord! Her role gave everyone else lore and purpose...
Youre right! With her lore being changed it changes LITERALLY everyones lore to some degree!
They need to change almost every freljordian champions lore ...
{{champion:161}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:127}}, there you go. Ofc they are not shipping all of these together. {{champion:106}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:77}} have their stuff going on too.

But they need to retcon the freljord page too like how they did with BW cause we might never know if some of the details there are still ok, outdated or not. Plus, yup, voli, trynda and udyr can wait and can come from other forms of media/their future VGUs but at least update all the 3 sisters/its descendants(ash and sej). :( Even ionia and all of its champs got their lores updated(except kennen because of his yordle influences), why can't at least ash and sej, the leaders of the other 2 tribes got their lores updated.
At this point the freljord page isn't canon anymore,the universe page is.
that's what i'm pointing out. so it needs an update.

Is the page even still online?
I know riot took down a lot of older promotion pages eventually,so I would be surprised if the freljord page even still exists.

Yeah, it's not really a 'Freljord' region update if the main page doesn't get any new changes at all. 

It may still come, but I think this slow, drip feeding us this lore event is more annoying than anything.
